resources:
Neuropsych Tool - Go/NoGo User ID Full Name Register
In this task, you will see a series of faces one at a time. Touch the screen when you see a certain kind of facial expression, but to Not touch at other times. 

 Touch the screen to start you the new rules.
Across the task, the rules on what facial expression or emotion to respond to will change, and an instruction screen will tell you the new rules.


Touch the screen to start.
